title: HATEOAS Link
description: REST application constraint (Hypermedia As The Engine Of Application State)

href.description: URL to invoke the action on the resource

action.description: HTTP Method to use for the request

rel.description: Relation of this link to its containing entity, as defined by and with many example relation values at [IETF RFC5988](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5988)

types.description: Content-types that can be used in the Accept header
